name: Raiden and Miko
description:
This is a game I made for scamp during a secret holiday gifting event (2022).
On her list of interests, among other things:

  • "genshin but specifically raiden shogun/yae miko"
  • "aside from media interests i love cookin. scamp cookin"

This game (or some proto-baby idea of it) came to mind immediately.

I hope that you have fun playing this love project of mine—words cannot describe how much fun I had making it. <3

Credits

I've bundled an enormous NOTES.txt file with the download. In it are direct links to every asset that I used for this project that I didn't create myself. For an unauthorized, free-download fangame, it's maybe a little silly that I'm so stressed about artist attribution, but... yaknow. we live in ai art times. its crazy.

~mini
